|brand = Panasonic |model = Switch |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -M8eG |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = PN28080K |page_start_date = 07/26/2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Panasonic_Switch-M8eG_(PN28080K) |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |pcb_id = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = <!-- OUI -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8380M; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = 4KEc |cpu1spd = 500 |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L25635FMI-10G; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W631GG8KB-15; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->

|exp_if_types = SFP |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIExpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = 1 |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.5 |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = C13
|serial = yes,, RJ45 console |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01BHO64UW |asin_country = JP |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specification=== *SoC: [[Realtek]] RTL8380M *Flash: Macronix MX25L25635FMI-10G (32MB, SPI NOR) *RAM: Winbond W631GG8KB-15 (128MB, DDR3) *Ethernet: 8x 1GbE ports, 1x SFP slot :Ports 1-8: TP, RTL8218B (PHY) :Port 9: SFP, RTL8380M (SoC) *UART: RS-232 port on the front panel (RJ-45) :Pin: 3:TX, 4:GND, 5:GND, 6:RX (RJ-45) 9600N8 *Power: 100-240 VAC, 50/60 Hz, 0.5 A :Plug: IEC 60320-C13 *Stock OS: VxWorks based *LEDs/Keys: 7x / 1x
==Links of Interest== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/panasonic/panasonic_switch-m8eg_pn28080k ''Panasonic Switch-M8eG PN28080K'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] (ToH/HW) • [https://patchwork.ozlabs.org/project/openwrt/patch/20211003065350.1437-4-musashino.open@gmail.com/#2787435 Spec.]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/panasonic/panasonic_switch-m8eg_pn28080k |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = realtek |subtarget = rtl838x |arch = mips_4kec |support_started_version = 22.03.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==See also== *[[Panasonic Switch-M8eG (PN28080K)]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8380M/RTL8218B *[[Panasonic Switch-M16eG (PN28160K)]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8380M//RTL8218B *[[Panasonic Switch-M24eG (PN28240K)]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8382M/RTL8218B/RTL8218FB *[[Panasonic Switch-M48eG (PN28480K)]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8393M/RTL8218B/RTL8218FB
<!-- https://www.mail-archive.com/openwrt-devel@lists.openwrt.org/msg61691.html - Switch-M8eG PN28080K (RTL8380M (8x), 8 + 1 SFP) - 1-9 : RTL8380M (SoC) / RTL8218B - Switch-M16eG PN28160K (RTL8382M?, 14 + 2 combo) - ? RTL8380M (SoC) / RTL8218B - Switch-M24eG PN28240K (RTL8382M (28x), 22 + 2 combo) - 1-8 : RTL8218B - 9-16: RTL8382M (SoC) - 17-24: RTL8218FB - Switch-M48eG PN28480K (RTL8393M (52x), 44 + 4 combo) - 1-40: RTL8218B - 41-48: RTL8218FB
Note:
- "Switch-M*eG" is a model name and "PN28xx0K" is a model number. Each model has two model number, "PN28xx0" and "PN28xx0K". But the first one (PN28xx0) is a Broadcom SoC based hardware. -->
[[Category:English Documentation]]
